special_powers.name: MJOLNIR SLAM
special_powers.description: Quake. When Thor uses it, damage from the attack can't be reduced below 1.

special_powers.name: GOD OF TRICKERY
special_powers.description: During force construction, you may add two TMT #002 Loki to your starting force on the click #1 that appears after the (orange) KO. It has a 0 point value for all effects (including scoring).

special_powers.name: ILLUSION OR REALITY
special_powers.description: Loki starts the game on the click #1 that appears after the (blue) KO. Until an effect needs to know, you don't have to reveal the point value of a TMT #002 Loki.

special_powers.name: THIS NO LONGER AMUSES ME
special_powers.description: STOP. Invulnerability. Each time this click is revealed, KO all other friendly TMT #002 Loki.

special_powers.name: MY, MY...YOU JUST KEEP FALLING FOR THIS, DON'T YOU
special_powers.description: Shape Change. When Loki uses it and succeeds, after resolutions you may generate within range and line of fire a TMT #002 Loki on the click #1 that appears after the (orange) KO. They have a 0 point value for all effects (including scoring).

special_powers.name: CHALLENGE COSMIC ENTITIES TO A GAME
special_powers.description: FREE: If Hercules has 0 or 1 action tokens, choose an adjacent opposing character of 100 points or more. Both players each roll a d6. If Hercules' result is equal or higher, give the chosen character an action token, otherwise give Hercules an action token. If the chosen character can use the Power Cosmic team ability, increase Hercules' result by +1.

special_powers.name: SPACE CHARIOT OF APOLLO
special_powers.description: Sidestep. Hypersonic Speed, but only once per game.

special_powers.name: MASTER COMBATANT
special_powers.description: Combat Reflexes, Toughness.

special_powers.name: POWERED BY RAGE
special_powers.description: When Hulk takes damage from an attack, give him a number of Rage tokens equal to the damage taken minus 1. Modify Hulk's combat values except range by +X, where X is the number of Rage tokens. , remove all Rage tokens.

special_powers.name: YOU WANT TO FIGHT HULK? THEN FIGHT HULK!
special_powers.description: Leap/Climb. When Hulk uses it, after resolutions he can use Charge at no cost.

special_powers.name: BARROOM BRAWL, ASGARDIAN STYLE
special_powers.description: Charge, Flurry, Plasticity.

special_powers.name: HERO OF ASGARD
special_powers.description: Toughness, Willpower. Modify Captain America's defense +2 when attacked by a character with the Asgardian keyword.

special_powers.name: ENHANCED SENSES
special_powers.description: Super Senses, but only when targeted by a range attack.

special_powers.name: FROM AN ALTERNATE EARTH
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters named Hulk or Spider-Man that are equal or more points (than this character) have "FREE: Replace this character with TMT #007 Spider-Man. (on the same click number)"

special_powers.name: OUT OF CONTROL
special_powers.description: Charge, Flurry.

special_powers.name: A WARRIOR'S WELCOME INTO VALHALLA
special_powers.description: When an adjacent friendly character of 25 points of more with the Asgardian keyword is KO'd, after resolutions roll a d6. 4-6: You may generate a Warrior Soul bystander in its square.

special_powers.name: STONE IS STRONG TOGETHER!
special_powers.description: Modify attack and defense +1 for each adjacent friendly character named Stone Men Of Saturn. When Stone Men Of Saturn has no action tokens and an adjacent friendly character named Stone Men Of Saturn is given a MOVE action, Stone Men Of Saturn can use Sidestep this turn.

special_powers.name: CLOAKING TECH AND ENERGY DAMPENING BOOTS
special_powers.description: Sidestep, Stealth. Improved Movement: Ignores Elevated Terrain but only to move to a lower elevation.

special_powers.name: VIBRANIUM MICROWEAVE MESH
special_powers.description: Toughness. Impervious, but only when targeted by a range attack.

special_powers.name: FIND A WAY TO DEFEAT THESE OAFS, WITH SCIENCE!
special_powers.description: Outwit. He may use it a second time this turn if the first use targeted a higher point value character and he chose the target's current defense power.

special_powers.name: BETRAY THE TEAM AGAIN OR FINALLY ESCAPE
special_powers.description: Once per game, when Red Leader would be KO'd, you may instead give another friendly character with the Thunderbolts keyword two action tokens (it must have 0 action tokens). If you do, turn Red Leader to click #1.

special_powers.name: GENIUS LEVEL INTELLECT, EVEN IF IT KILLS ME
special_powers.description: Outwit, Perplex. Red Leader may use his Perplex as POWER, and if he does modify the chosen combat value +2 or -2 instead.

special_powers.name: SSSNEAK ATTACK
special_powers.description: Phasing/Teleport. When King Cobra uses it and moves 3 squares or less, after resolutions he may make a close attack.

special_powers.name: SSSTRIKE AT THEIR HEARTSSS
special_powers.description: Leadership. If King Cobra uses it and succeeds, he may remove a action token from a friendly character with the Serpent Society keyword regardless of adjacency. Increase his Leadership roll by +1 for each friendly character that is adjacent to an opposing character.

special_powers.name: CHANNEL COSMIC ENERGY
special_powers.description: FREE: Until your next turn, Thena can't use the Power Cosmic team ability, but can use Perplex and Willpower. When she uses Perplex and targets herself, modify a combat value +2 instead.

special_powers.name: THE DISCIPLINE OF WARFARE
special_powers.description: Whenever Thena hits with an attack, after resolutions give the target an action token. If you can't, deal it 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: COMPLETE MOLECULAR CONTROL
special_powers.description: Regeneration, Toughness.

special_powers.name: LIVE UP TO THE NAME
special_powers.description: Improved Movement: Hindering. When Piledriver occupies a Debris marker, he can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.

special_powers.name: SWINGIN' FOR THA FENCES
special_powers.description: KNOCKBACK and may knock back characters that can't be knocked back due only to Charge or Combat Reflexes. When Piledriver knocks back a character, after resolutions you may move Piledriver up to a number of squares equal to the highest number of squares a character was knocked back.

special_powers.name: GODDESS OF THUNDER
special_powers.description: Force Blast. Once per turn, when Thor hits one or more opposing characters with an attack, after resolutions she may make a range attack targeting a single character that hasn't been attacked this turn.

special_powers.name: CAPE IN YOUR EYES
special_powers.description: When Thor hits a single adjacent opposing character, you may choose to decrease the damage dealt by 2. If you do, that character can't move or make an attack until your next turn.

special_powers.name: ONE IMPROVISED HAND CANNON, COMING UP
special_powers.description: Penetrating/Psychic Blast, Improved Targeting: Adjacency.

special_powers.name: HERO OF ASGARD
special_powers.description: Toughness, Willpower. Modify Iron Man's defense +2 when attacked by a character with the Asgardian keyword.

special_powers.name: POWERED BY RAGE
special_powers.description: When Hulk takes damage from an attack, give her a number of Rage tokens equal to the damage taken minus 1. Modify Hulk's combat values except range by +X, where X is the number of Rage tokens. , remove all Rage tokens.

special_powers.name: I SAID... GET AWAY FROM ME!
special_powers.description: Super Strength. Force Blast. If a character Hulk knocks back is stopped by an opposing character, after resolutions deal both characters 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: POWERED BY RAGE
special_powers.description: When Red Hulk takes damage from an attack, give him a number of Rage tokens equal to the damage taken minus 1. Modify Red Hulk's combat values except range by +X, where X is the number of Rage tokens. , remove all Rage tokens.

special_powers.name: THE MADDER HE GETS, THE HOTTER HE GETS...
special_powers.description: When Red Hulk clicks damage from an opponent's attack or is targeted by Outwit, give him a Heat Token, maximum 4.

special_powers.name: RED HOT
special_powers.description: Poison. When Red Hulk uses it, he may instead deal 1 damage to all opposing characters within X squares, where X is the number of Heat tokens.

special_powers.name: DON'T SAY I DIDN'T WARN YOU!
special_powers.description: Impervious. When Red Hulk uses it, after rolling the d6, you may remove any number of Heat tokens to increase the d6 result by that much.

special_powers.name: ONLY HERE TO HELP
special_powers.description: Opposing characters of 75 points or more can't draw lines of fire to Jane Foster unless it is the only character on the map from that force. When an adjacent friendly character is KO'd by an opponents attack, after resolutions you may roll a D6 and replace Jane Foster with TMT #017 Thor on a click # equal to the result

special_powers.name: PLEASE TRY TO HOLD STILL
special_powers.description: Support, even if her target is adjacent to an opposing character.

special_powers.name: TWICE-FAVORED BY ODIN
special_powers.description: When Eric Masterson would be KO'd by an opponent's attack, you may instead choose to replace him with either TMT #018 Thor or TMT #062 Thunderstrike. If you do, roll a d6 and increase the result by the damage dealt to Eric Masterson (that would KO him). The replacement character begins on click #1 but is then immediately dealt that amount of damage as unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: INSPIRING COURAGE FOR A MORTAL
special_powers.description: Perplex as POWER and may only target a friendly character of 75 or more points within 3 squares.

special_powers.name: LONG HISTORY OF BEING MANIPULATED
special_powers.description: Friendly characters can use their Mind Control to target Valkyrie. If they do and the character is named Enchantress or Lorelei, and if Valkyrie is hit, modify her combat values +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: STRONGEST OF THE ROCK TROLLS
special_powers.description: When Ulik makes an attack, his attack and damage values may become 1 more than the highest printed attack and damage values among all friendly characters named Rock Troll within 8 squares.

special_powers.name: WE ARE THE WARBOUND
special_powers.description: When Korg has 0 or 1 action tokens and an adjacent friendly character named Hulk would be given an action token, you may roll a d6. 5-6: Give the action token to Korg instead.

special_powers.name: KRONAN WARRIOR
special_powers.description: Korg can reduce penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: VIBRANIUM MICROWEAVE MESH
special_powers.description: Toughness. Impervious, but only when targeted by a range attack.

special_powers.name: CLOAKING TECH AND ENERGY DAMPENING BOOTS
special_powers.description: Sidestep, Stealth. Improved Movement: Elevated but only to move to a lower elevation.

special_powers.name: ADOPTED SON AND LOYAL SERVANT OF WAKANDA
special_powers.description: Leadership. When White Wolf uses it and succeeds, you may instead remove and action token from all friendly characters named Hatut Zeraze, regardless of adjacency.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF THE BLOODAXE
special_powers.description: Executioner starts the game with the TMT #s001 Bloodaxe equipped.

special_powers.name: I STAND BY AMORA, NO MATTER WHAT
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - If Executioner is adjacent to a character named Enchantress, both modify defense +1.

special_powers.name: I WILL STAY BEHIND AND THE LAST LAUGH WILL BE MINE
special_powers.description: FREE: Once per game, generate a Last Laugh marker in the square Skurge occupies. As long as Skurge occupies the square with the Last Laugh marker, he modifies defense +2, takes a maximum of 1 damage from attacks, and can't be moved or placed by opposing characters.

special_powers.name: WHEN YOU ARE NEXT IN ASGARD, LAUGH SKURGE'S LAST LAUGH TOGETHER
special_powers.description: STOP. FREE: Deal Skurge 1 unavoidable damage and heal a friendly character 3 clicks.

special_powers.name: 'TIS SKURGE'S LAST LAUGH
special_powers.description: Close Combat Expert, Ranged Combat Expert.

special_powers.name: TELEPORTATION, COURTESY OF SETH
special_powers.description: Phasing/Teleport.

special_powers.name: JUST HAVE A SIP OF THIS POTION...
special_powers.description: Mind Control, but only as CLOSE. When Lorelei uses it and hits an opposing character, her target can't target her with an attack until your next turn.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF THE KNOBBED MACE
special_powers.description: Hogun starts the game with the TMT #s002 Knobbed Mace equipped.

special_powers.name: WARRIORS THREE, HOGUN LEADING THE CHARGE
special_powers.description: Charge. When Hogun uses it and hits an opposing character, after resolutions each friendly character with the Asgardian keyword adjacent to him at the start of the action can use Charge as FREE this turn.

special_powers.name: LIVE UP TO THE NAME
special_powers.description: Improved Movement: Hindering. When Bulldozer occupies a Debris marker, he can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.

special_powers.name: COMIN' THRU PIPSQUEAK!
special_powers.description: Charge. When Bulldozer uses it, he breaks away automatically.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF FROGJOLNIR
special_powers.description: Throg starts the game with TMT #s003 Frogjolnir equipped.

special_powers.name: FIELD LEADER OF THE PET AVENGERS
special_powers.description: Perplex. When Throg uses it to target a character with the Animal or Pet Avengers keyword, he may modify a combat value except damage +2 instead.

special_powers.name: FROM AN ALTERNATE EARTH
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters named Iron Man or Rocket Raccoon that are equal or more points (than this character) have "FREE: Replace this character with TMT #034 Iron Rocket Man (on the same click number)".

special_powers.name: ULTIMATE STRATEGIST
special_powers.description: Probability Control. Once per turn, when an opposing character within range and line of fire would move, you may choose the first square that character moves into.

special_powers.name: MYSTICAL POWER RECHANNELED
special_powers.description: When Thorbuster takes damage from the Mystics team ability or an attack from a character with the Asgardian, Deity, or Mystical keywords, after resolutions heal him 1 click.

special_powers.name: TO BREAK UP THE THOR WORSHIP CULT
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within range and line of fire can't use or have their combat values modified by Empower or Enhancement.

special_powers.name: TYPE X REPULSORS, ODIN-FORCE POWERED
special_powers.description: Thorbuster deals penetrating damage. When he attacks a character that can use Invincible, modify damage +2.

special_powers.name: I HAVE POLYMORPH POWERS
special_powers.description: Shape Change. At the beginning of your turn, you may turn her to the same click number of a different color and then heal her 1 click. When she is on a blue click number, she has Tiny Symbol.

special_powers.name: BIG STRETCHY FISTS
special_powers.description: Giant Reach: 2

special_powers.name: THINK SMALL TO SOLVE BIG PROBLEMS
special_powers.description: Outwit, Perplex. Modify attack +1 for each action token on her target.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF FREY
special_powers.description: Balder starts the game with TMT #s004 Frey equipped

special_powers.name: LIMITED POWERS OF LIGHT
special_powers.description: Penetrating/Psychic Blast, Pulse Wave. Balder can use both with a range value of 5.

special_powers.name: PRINCE OF ASGARD AND HALF-BROTHER TO THOR
special_powers.description: Leadership, Empower. Shape Change, but only if adjacent to a friendly character with the Asgardian keyword.

special_powers.name: I CAN SMELL THEM
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose an adjacent friendly character.  That character can use Improved Targeting: Hindering this turn.

special_powers.name: LEAPING ATTACK
special_powers.description: Charge, Leap/Climb.  When Troll uses Charge, she can use Improved Movement: Elevated, Hindering, Outdoor Blocking, Move Through.

special_powers.name: SUMMON LEGIONS OF HADES
special_powers.description: When a character of 50 points or more is KO'd by an attack, you may generate two Warrior Soul bystanders (into squares adjacent to Pluto).

special_powers.name: DEATH GODS DIE HARD
special_powers.description: STOP. Impervious, Regeneration.

special_powers.name: FOUGHT DR. STRANGE TO A STANDSTILL
special_powers.description: Perplex. Probability Control, but only when he attacks or is the target of an attack. Pluto has PROTECTED: Outwit.

special_powers.name: PROGRAMMED FOR DESTRUCTION... AND NOTHING ELSE
special_powers.description: Passengers: 0, Sidestep. When Destroyer uses Sidestep, it breaks away automatically.

special_powers.name: LIFE FORCE POSSESSION
special_powers.description: Once per turn, one adjacent friendly character with the Asgardian or Deity keyword can use "POWER: Deal this character up to 3 clicks of unavoidable damage, then heal Destroyer that many clicks."

special_powers.name: TEACH YOU HUMILITY, ONE WAY OR ANOTHER
special_powers.description: Once per turn, when an opposing character attacks one or more characters of a higher point value, you may reroll the attack roll.

special_powers.name: INCALCULABLE MIGHT
special_powers.description: POWER: If Odin the Destroyer has 1 action token, give him any two actions at no cost.

special_powers.name: SURVIVE UNIVERSAL ARMAGEDDON
special_powers.description: Impervious, but succeeds on a result of 3 - 6.

special_powers.name: SKYFATHERS FACE THE CELESTIALS
special_powers.description: Colossal symbol. When Odin the Destroyer attacks a character that has Colossal symbol or is 200 points or more, modify attack and damage +2.

special_powers.name: PREPARE MY ARMY
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, generate two Tyrannoid bystanders. POWER: Generate a Tyrannoid bystander.

special_powers.name: A SUBTERRANEAN EMPIRE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, if Tyrannus has two action tokens, generate a Tyrannoid bystander.

special_powers.name: FLAME OF LIFE
special_powers.description: Mind Control with a range value of 6. When Tyrannus uses it and hits, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to his target and heal Tyrannus 1 click.

special_powers.name: DEVIANT TECHNOLOGY
special_powers.description: Perplex, but only to target Tyrannoid bystanders. When Tyrranus uses it, he can use Improved Targeting: Characters and modifies the same combat value on all friendly Tyrranoid bystanders within range and line of fire.

special_powers.name: TIME CUBE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, choose one: you may generate a Time marker in Zarrko, The Tomorrow Man's square -or- place him into another square with a Time marker, heal him 1 click, then remove that Time marker from the map.

special_powers.name: TO STOP THOR, THE FUTURE TYRANT
special_powers.description: Probability Control. When Zarrko, The Tomorrow Man uses it, he can target characters with the Asgardian keyword regardless of range or line of fire.

special_powers.name: CHANNEL COSMIC ENERGY
special_powers.description: FREE: Until your next turn, Ajak can't use the Power Cosmic team ability, but can use Perplex and Willpower. When he uses Perplex and targets himself, modify a combat value +2 instead

special_powers.name: THE DISCIPLINE OF UNCOVERED HISTORY
special_powers.description: When placing objects during game setup, if you did not choose the map, you may place your opponent's objects.

special_powers.name: COMPLETE MOLECULAR CONTROL
special_powers.description: Regeneration, Toughness.

special_powers.name: SPEAKER TO CELESTIALS
special_powers.description: Probability Control. Ajak may use it a second time during your turn, if the first use targeted a character with the Eternal keyword.

special_powers.name: CHANNEL COSMIC ENERGY
special_powers.description: FREE: Until your next turn, Ikaris can't use the Power Cosmic team ability, but can use Perplex and Willpower. When he uses Perplex and targets himself, modify a combat value +2 instead.

special_powers.name: MANIPULATE GRAVITONS
special_powers.description: Super Strength, Telekinesis.

special_powers.name: COMPLETE MOLECULAR CONTROL
special_powers.description: Regeneration, Toughness.

special_powers.name: THE DISCIPLINE OF LEADERSHIP
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Ikaris uses it and succeeds, you may instead remove all action tokens from all adjacent friendly characters with the Eternal keyword.

special_powers.name: CHANNEL COSMIC ENERGY
special_powers.description: FREE: Until your next turn, Makkari can't use the Power Cosmic team ability, but can use Perplex and Willpower. When he uses Perplex and targets himself, modify a combat value +2 instead

special_powers.name: THE DISCIPLINE OF SPEED
special_powers.description: Hypersonic Speed, but can only make close attacks.

special_powers.name: COMPLETE MOLECULAR CONTROL
special_powers.description: Regeneration, Toughness.

special_powers.name: WARRIORS THREE, VOLSTAGG LEADING THE CHARGE
special_powers.description: Charge, Plasticity. When Volstagg uses Charge and hits an opposing character, after resolutions each friendly character with the Asgardian keyword adjacent to him at the start of the action can't take more than 1 damage from an attack until your next turn.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF THE ENCHANTED CROWBAR
special_powers.description: Wrecker starts the game with the TMT #s005 Enchanted Crowbar equipped.

special_powers.name: LIVE UP TO THE NAME
special_powers.description: Improved Movement: Hindering. When Wrecker occupies a Debris marker, he can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.

special_powers.name: WE'RE GONNA WRECK IT BOYS!
special_powers.description: Empower, Leadership. When Wrecker uses Leadership and succeeds, after resolutions, each friendly character with the Wrecking Crew keyword within 3 squares may destroy a wall or square of blocking terrain adjacent to themselves.

special_powers.name: CONTINUITY
special_powers.description: When Thor Odinson is KO'd, friendly characters can't move or make attacks during your next turn.

special_powers.name: BRING THE LIGHTNING
special_powers.description: FREE: When Thor Odinson targets and hits a single opposing character with a range attack this turn, after resolutions once per turn he may make a range attack targeting a different opposing character.

special_powers.name: RESTORE THE LOST ASGARDIANS
special_powers.description: FREE: Place adjacent another friendly character with the Asgardian keyword. If you do, heal both Thor Odinson and that character 1 click.

special_powers.name: GOD OF THUNDER
special_powers.description: FREE: For the rest of the game as long as Thor Odinson is on the map, when an opposing character would get an action token, it gets two action tokens instead.

special_powers.name: CONTINUITY
special_powers.description: When Loki, Agent of Asgard is KO'd, friendly characters can't use defense powers until your next turn.

special_powers.name: MANIPULATED BY KING LOKI
special_powers.description: FREE: Until your next turn, opposing characters can't use Perplex or Probability Control to target Loki, Agent of Asgard or friendly characters within 3 squares of him.

special_powers.name: HONEST, I'M UNDERCOVER FOR THE ALL-MOTHER
special_powers.description: FREE: At the beginning of your next turn, if no opposing character hit Loki, Agent of Asgard since you activated this, heal Loki, Agent of Asgard 2 clicks.

special_powers.name: GRAM, SWORD OF TRUTH
special_powers.description: FREE: Adjacent opposing characters of 200 points or less can't use defense powers this turn.

special_powers.name: I AM GROOT...
special_powers.description: Plasticity. Opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire treat Groot Thor as if he was adjacent for movement purposes. (This includes stopping and breaking away).

special_powers.name: FROM AN ALTERNATE EARTH
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters named Groot or Thor that are equal or more points (than this character) have "FREE: Replace this character with TMT #051 Groot Thor. (on the same click number)"

special_powers.name: I AM GROOT!
special_powers.description: Quake, but deals 3 damage instead of 2.

special_powers.name: I AM GROOT?
special_powers.description: STOP. Regeneration.

special_powers.name: POWERED BY RAGE
special_powers.description: When Hulk takes damage from an attack, give him a number of Rage tokens equal to the damage taken minus 1. Modify Hulk's combat values except range by +X, where X is the number of Rage tokens. , remove all Rage tokens.

special_powers.name: SMASH THROUGH FROST GIANTS
special_powers.description: Charge. When Hulk uses it, he can use Improved Movement: Destroy Blocking and, after resolutions he may make a close attack targeting each character that has "giant damage symbol" or "colossal damage symbol" he moved through, regardless of adjacency. Hit characters are dealt 3 penetrating damage instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: RELEASE THE SOULS OF HEL
special_powers.description: When a non-bystander character is KO'd, heal Hela 1 click and you may generate a Warrior Soul bystander normally (in an adjacent square) or in that character's square.

special_powers.name: OBEY THE POWER OF DEATH
special_powers.description: Mind Control. When Hela uses it, she has a range value of 9, two lightning bolts.

special_powers.name: ASGARDIAN GODDESS OF DEATH
special_powers.description: Exploit Weakness, Shape Change. When a character of 200 points or less would take damage from a close attack made by Hela that is a critical hit, instead immediately KO that character.

special_powers.name: THE NEW QUEEN OF HEL
special_powers.description: When Angela KO's the opposing character with the highest point value, for the rest of the game she can use Exploit Weakness and the Mystics team ability. Each additional time she does this, increase the damage she deals with the Mystics ability by 1 for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: CONQUER HEL TO SAVE SERA
special_powers.description: Angela can't have her combat values modified by higher point characters. Angela has PROTECTED; Outwit.

special_powers.name: CLEAVE THROUGH THE HORDES OF THE DEAD
special_powers.description: When Angela KO's an opposing character, you may give her a CLOSE or RANGE action as FREE this turn.

special_powers.name: STRIP YOUR IMMORTALITY FROM YOU
special_powers.description: Adjacent opposing characters can't use Willpower. Adjacent opposing characters modify their combat values -1 if they can use the Power Cosmic team ability or have the Deity keyword.

special_powers.name: WALK AMONGST HUMANITY UNNOTICED
special_powers.description: Shape Change. When Zeus uses it and fails, he can't use it again this turn.

special_powers.name: LIGHTNING BOLT OF THE GODS
special_powers.description: Energy Explosion. When Zeus uses it, increase the damage dealt to each hit target by 2 if he had one original target and by 1 if he had two original targets.

special_powers.name: SEND TO EXILE IN HADES
special_powers.description: POWER: Once per game, choose an opposing character of 200 points or less within range and line of fire. You may place that character into your starting area. If you do, it can't move or make an attack until your next turn.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF THE MIRROR OF MYSOLLJH
special_powers.description: Enchantress starts the game with the TMT #s006 Mirror of Mysolljh equipped.

special_powers.name: MASTER MANIPULATOR
special_powers.description: Mind Control, Stealth. FREE: All opposing characters within 6 squares may each be moved 1 square in any order you choose.

special_powers.name: A TROPHY ROOM FULL OF TOYS
special_powers.description: Colossal Stamina. During force construction, you may include up to 3 Equipment-Objects that each cost 10 points or less in your Sideline. When placing objects during game setup, you may place one of these objects in addition to your other placed objects.

special_powers.name: THIS PLACE IS ALREADY A WRECK, WHAT'S A BIT MORE DESTRUCTION?
special_powers.description: Charge, Flurry, Force Blast. If a character Maestro knocks back is stopped by a square of blocking terrain, destroy that terrain, then place that character in that square and, after resolutions, deal that character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: I'LL SHOW YOU HOW IT'S DONE
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Maestro uses it and succeeds, you may also remove an action token from Maestro.

special_powers.name: CHANNEL COSMIC ENERGY
special_powers.description: FREE: Until your next turn, Sersi can't use the Power Cosmic team ability, but can use Perplex and Willpower. When she uses Perplex and targets herself, modify a combat value +2 instead.

special_powers.name: THE DISCIPLINE OF TRANSUBSTANTIATION
special_powers.description: Barrier. Sersi may use it as FREE, but only to place two blocking terrain markers that do not have to be adjacent to each other and must both be within 10 squares and line of fire.

special_powers.name: STILL PLAYING FROM THE SIDELINES
special_powers.description: Stealth, Mind Control. When Sersi uses Mind Control, she has "two targets" and modifies attack +1 if targeting a single character.

special_powers.name: COMPLETE MOLECULAR CONTROL
special_powers.description: Regeneration, Toughness.

special_powers.name: FORGED IN BLUE FLAME
special_powers.description: During force construction, you may include a number of different characters in your sideline with the Eternal keyword, adding 5 points to Uni-Mind's point cost for each. If it starts at 150 points, you may include up to 3. If it starts at 275 points, you may include up to 5. If it starts at 370 points, you may include any number. The included characters must be used at their highest point value and be turned to their starting click. At the beginning of your turn, you may choose one standard power a chosen character can use. Uni-Mind can use that power until it chooses again. When Uni-Mind would be KO'd, instead replace it with all the chosen characters on their last non-KO clicks, placing them within 4 squares of it. Those characters can't be healed this game. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: CHANNEL VAST RESERVES OF COSMIC ENEMY
special_powers.description: FREE: Until your next turn, Uni-Mind can't use the Power Cosmic team ability, but can use Perplex and Willpower. When it uses Perplex targeting a character with the Eternals keyword, it may modify a combat value by +2 or -2 instead. This turn, it may use Perplex an additional time for every two characters with the Eternal keyword in your Sideline that it can choose powers from.

special_powers.name: PERFECT MOLECULAR CONTROL
special_powers.description: STOP. Impervious. Regeneration.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF THE DUELING SWORD
special_powers.description: Fandral starts the game with the TMT #s007 Dueling Sword equipped.

special_powers.name: WARRIORS THREE, FANDRAL LEADING THE CHARGE
special_powers.description: Charge, Flurry. When Fandral uses Charge, each time he hits an opposing character, after resolutions each friendly character with the Asgardian keyword adjacent to him at the start of the action may roll a d6. 5-6: Remove an action token from that character.

special_powers.name: LEGENDARY WIELDER OF THE ENCHANTED BALL AND CHAIN
special_powers.description: Thunderball starts the game with the TMT #s008 Enchanted Ball and Chain equipped.

special_powers.name: LIVE UP TO THE NAME
special_powers.description: Improved Movement: Hindering. When Thunderball occupies a Debris marker, he can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.

special_powers.name: THE OL' BALL AND CHAIN
special_powers.description: Giant Reach: 3. When Thunderball hits one or more opposing characters, after resolutions modify those character's combat values by -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF MJOLNIR
special_powers.description: Thor starts the game with TMT #s009 Mjolnir equipped.

special_powers.name: MIGHTY SON OF ASGARD
special_powers.description: Super Strength. Thor may hold two objects, and may pick up and/or put down an object twice total during a move. When Thor is given a close object action, he may use either or both held objects.

special_powers.name: ANTI-CURSE HEALING ARMOR
special_powers.description: Invincible. When Thor takes damage from an attack that was not a critical hit, after resolutions heal him 1 click.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF THUNDERSTRIKE
special_powers.description: Thunderstrike starts the game with TMT #s010 Thunderstrike equipped.

special_powers.name: SACRIFICE THUNDERSTRIKE TO DESTROY THE BLOODAXE
special_powers.description: When Thunderstrike is KO'd, you may choose an Equipment-Object that started the game on your force and one that started the game on an opponent's force. If you do, remove both objects from the game (even if they are equipped).

special_powers.name: THE WORLD STILL NEEDS HEROES
special_powers.description: Empower, Enhancement. Each time a friendly character attacks while having their damage value modified by one of these powers, modify Thunderstrike's attack +1 this turn.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF STORMBREAKER
special_powers.description: Beta Ray Bill starts the game with TMT #s011 Stormbreaker equipped.

special_powers.name: KORBINITE DNA
special_powers.description: Beta Ray Bill can reduce penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: AIDED BY SKUTTLEBUTT
special_powers.description: STOP. Regeneration, Toughness. When Beta Ray Bill is given a MOVE action, after resolutions he can use Regeneration at no cost.

special_powers.name: WEATHER MANIPULATION
special_powers.description: Probability Control. Opposing characters can't target Beta Ray Bill or friendly characters adjacent to him unless they began their turn within 4 squares of their target or are making a close attack.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF THE CASKET OF ANCIENT WINTERS
special_powers.description: Malekth starts the game with the TMT #s012 Casket of Ancient Winters equipped.

special_powers.name: VULNERABLE TO IRON, BUT NOT MUCH ELSE
special_powers.description: Malekith takes a maximum of 1 damage from range attacks.

special_powers.name: GATHER SUPPORT FROM MY PEOPLE
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When an opposing character within range and line of fire is given an action token by an effect of a character (not equipment) on your force, after resolution you may roll a d6. 4-6: generate a Dark Elf bystander adjacent to it.

special_powers.name: CHANGE OTHER'S SHAPE
special_powers.description: Shape Change, but succeeds on a 4-6. Other friendly characters can use Shape Change, but succeed only on a 6.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF JARNBJORN
special_powers.description: Unworthy Thor starts the game with TMT #s013 Jarnbjorn equipped.

special_powers.name: UNBROKEN
special_powers.description: Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: FIGHTING TO SURVIVE
special_powers.description: Improved Movement: Hindering, Improved Targeting: Hindering. Unworthy Thor's range value is 7.

special_powers.name: HAMMER OF A DEAD REALITY'S THOR
special_powers.description: Improved Movement: Ignores Hindering Terrain, Improved Targeting: Ignores Hindering Terrain. Unworthy Thor's range value is 7.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF LOKI'S STAFF
special_powers.description: Loki starts the game with TMT #s014 Loki's Staff equipped.

special_powers.name: ASSUME WANDA'S FORM
special_powers.description: POWER: Turn Loki to click #9. If you do, when she would be KO'ed, turn her to click #6 instead and she can't be healed this game.

special_powers.name: SIF'S FORM, STOLEN
special_powers.description: Combat Reflexes, Toughness.

special_powers.name: I DON'T LIE, JUST SHARE UNCOMFORTABLE TRUTHS
special_powers.description: Perplex, Probability Control.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF GUNGNIR
special_powers.description: Odin starts the game with TMT #s015 Gungnir equipped.

special_powers.name: ALLFATHER, KING OF ASGARD
special_powers.description: Leadership. Other friendly characters with the Asgardian keyword modify attack +1.

special_powers.name: ODINSLEEP
special_powers.description: STOP. Impervious, Super Senses. At the end of your turn, give Odin a Sleep token. FREE: Remove all Sleep tokens to heal Odin a number of clicks equal to the number of tokens removed.

special_powers.name: ROYAL GUARDS OF ODIN
special_powers.description: POWER: Generate a Crimson Hawk bystander. DOUBLE POWER: Generate two Crimson Hawk bystanders. You may not have more than 5 Crimson Hawk bystanders on your force.

special_powers.name: ROYAL GUARD OF ASGARD
special_powers.description: Crimson Hawk has the Asgardian keyword. Crimson Hawk's move actions don't count against your action total.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF DRAGONFANG
special_powers.description: Valkyrie starts the game with TMT #s016 Dragonfang equipped.

special_powers.name: RIDER OF THE HEAVENS
special_powers.description: [Wing Symbol], Sidestep.  Valkyrie can only carry characters that share a keyword with her.

special_powers.name: TOGETHER AGAIN
special_powers.description: STOP. Invulnerability. Adjacent friendly characters modify speed by +1.

special_powers.name: MJOLNIR FOUND!
special_powers.description: Ranged Combat Expert with a range value of 6.

special_powers.name: LOKI'S TREACHERY GOES ON
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, give Loki an Illusion token. When he would be KO'd, remove the Illusion token and turn him to click #1 instead. If he has an Illusion token, he can use Colossal Stamina and cannot be healed.

special_powers.name: WIELDER OF THE ASGARDIAN SHIELD
special_powers.description: Captain America starts the game with TMT#s102 Asgardian Shield equipped without paying for it.

special_powers.name: TOGETHER AGAIN
special_powers.description: STOP. Combat Reflexes. Adjacent friendly characters modify attack by +1.

special_powers.name: GAUNTLET CANNON
special_powers.description: Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When Iron Man uses it, he may instead target all opposing characters within range along a single direct line. (He deals his damage value to each hit target).

special_powers.name: TOGETHER AGAIN
special_powers.description: STOP. Invulnerability. Adjacent friendly characters modify defense by +1.

special_powers.name: HULK SMASH
special_powers.description: When Hulk moves, after actions resolve he can use Quake at no cost.

special_powers.name: VULNERABLE TO COLD
special_powers.description: Characters that can use Incapacitate modify their damage by +1 when attacking Surtur.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: WATCH THE WORLD BURN
special_powers.description: FREE: If no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Surtur or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Surtur such that he can make a close combat attack targeting the chosen character, then do so. After resolutions, deal 1 penetrating damage to each opposing character within 2 squares.

special_powers.name: BLAZING FIREBALLS
special_powers.description: Energy Explosion with "3 targets".

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: STOP. Toughness. If Surtur began the game on the 25-point starting line, he can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation.

special_powers.name: TWILIGHT, SWORD OF DOOM
special_powers.description: Opposing characters can't use defense powers if they are the only target of Surtur's attack.

special_powers.name: VULNERABLE TO FIRE
special_powers.description: Characters that can use Energy Explosion modify their damage +1 when attacking Ymir.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: BRING FOR THE ICE REALM
special_powers.description: FREE: If no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Ymir or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Ymir such that he can make a close attack targeting the chosen character and all other opposing characters within 4 squares and line of fire, then do so. Instead of normal damage, give each hit character two action tokens that don't deal pushing damage.

special_powers.name: COLD SNAP
special_powers.description: Incapacitate with "3 Bolts". When Ymir uses it, he may also deal normal damage, divided as you choose among hit targets.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: STOP. Toughness. If Ymir began the game on the 25 point starting line, he can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation.

special_powers.name: CHILL IN YOUR BONES
special_powers.description: FREE: Make a close attack, but only to target an opposing character with one action token.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: STOP. Defend, Toughness. If Groot began the game on the 20-point starting line, he can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: I AM GROOT!
special_powers.description: FREE: If no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Groot or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Groot such that he can make a close attack targeting the chosen character and all other characters except Groot within 4 squares and line of fire then do so. Instead of dealing normal damage, give each hit opposing character an action token and heal each hit friendly character 1 click.

special_powers.name: PLANET OF THE SYMBIOTES
special_powers.description: During force construction, you may add 10 points to Carnage's cost up to five times. For each time you choose to do so, add a Symbiote bystander to your starting force.

special_powers.name: THEM SYMBIOTES SURE IS TASTY
special_powers.description: Plasticity. At the beginning of your turn, Carnage may KO one adjacent Symbiote bystander to heal 2 clicks. (He can't heal past this game's starting line.)

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: SYMBIOTE SPAWN
special_powers.description: FREE: If no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Carnage or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Carnage such that he can make a close attack targeting the chosen character, then do so. After resolutions, you may generate a Symbiote bystander adjacent to the chosen character.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: STOP. Toughness. If Carnage began the game on the 10-point starting line, he can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: I HAVE SUPER POWERS!
special_powers.description: FREE: If no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Ms. Marvel or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Ms. Marvel such that she can make a close attack targeting the chosen character and all other opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire using KNOCKBACK, then do so.

special_powers.name: EMBIGGEN BASH
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose an unoccupied square within 4 sqaures and line of fire. Ms. Marvel can use Quake as if she occupied that square this turn, dealing each hit character her printed damage value instead of 2.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: STOP. Toughness. If Ms. Marvel began the game on the 15-point starting line, she can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation.

special_powers.name: SHAPESHIFT SHAPE CHANGE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose one to last until your next turn: Ms. Marvel has "tiny symbol" and modifies her defense +1; -or- She has "giant symbol" and modifies her attack +1.

special_powers.name: PULL THE ODINSWORD
special_powers.description: POWER: Once per game, if Mangog completely occupies an opponent's starting area and hasn't been moved or placed by another friendly character this game, turn his dial to the next starting line higher than his current starting line, and that becomes his new starting line and point value.

special_powers.name: SLIVER OF THE ODIN-FORCE
special_powers.description: Penetrating/Psychic Blast with a range value of 8.

special_powers.name: IMPERVIOUS COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: STOP. Impervious. If Mangog began the game on the 30-point starting line, he can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: MULTI-POWERED TAIL
special_powers.description: FREE: If no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Mangog or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Mangog such that he can make a close attack targeting the chosen character and all other opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire, then do so. Hit characters are each dealt 4 damage instead of normal damage. After resolutions, make a close attack targeting each opposing character within 2 squares and line of fire. Hit characters are each dealt 3 damage instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION
special_powers.description: FREE: If no other Colossal Retaliation power has bee activated this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Frost Giant or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Frost Giant such that it can make a close attack targeting the chosen character and all other opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire, then do so. (Hit characters are each dealt this character's damage value.)

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: STOP. Toughness. If Frost Giant began the game on the 20 point starting line, it can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation.

special_powers.name: ONCE YOU ARE CLOSE ENOUGH TO FEEL THEIR CHILL... YOU ARE ALREADY DEAD AND JUST DON'T KNOW IT
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, choose one: Give an adjacent opposing character an action token, -or- Give each adjacent opposing character that's lower points an action token.

special_powers.name: DRINK DEEP, SAPLING
special_powers.description: Flora Colossus may heal past its starting lines but can't heal except by this trait. , you may roll a d6. 5-6: Heal 1 click. If it occupies water terrain, heal 2 clicks instead.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION
special_powers.description: FREE: If no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Flora Colossus or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Flora Colossus such that it can make a close combat attack targeting the chosen character and all other opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire, then do so. Hit characters are each dealt this character's damage value.

special_powers.name: SLEEP SPORES
special_powers.description: Quake. When Flora Colossus uses it, after resolutions any characters knocked back are given an action token.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: STOP. Toughness. If Flora Colossus began the game on the 10-point starting line, he can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Battle Fury, Exploit Weakness, Steal Energy.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: When this character hits an opposing character with a close attack, modify the hit character's attack -2 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: "Tiny Symbol", but is still considered a standard character for equipping purposes. When this character occupies water terrain, modify attack and defense +1.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs, and its minimum result is the character's printed damage value.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Exploit Weakness. When this character attacks, hit characters that can use Invincible or Impervious use Invulnerability instead.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Shape Change that succeeds on 3 - 6. If a 1 or 2 is the result, KO this object.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: When this character makes a close attack targeting an opposing character that isn't adjacent to any characters except the attacker, modify attack +2.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Quake, but deals this character's printed damage value instead of 2.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: When this character makes a close attack that targets a single character the target may be within range and line of fire, regardless of adjacency. Modify this character's attack and damage +1 when attacking a single adjacent character.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Force Blast, Leap/Climb. When this character knocks back an opposing character at least 1 square, after resolutions heal this character 1 click.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Energy Explosion, Quake. Modify range +2.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: POWER. If this character is 100 points or more, give it 3 Fimbulwinter tokens. At the end of each player's turn, remove a Fimbulwinter token from the equipped character. If you do, give an action token to each of the active player's characters within 7 squares without the Asgardian, Cosmic, or Deity keywords. If you remove the last Fimbulwinter token, KO this object instead.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: This character's attack rolls of 9-11 that hit count as critical hits.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Mind Control, Shape Change

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: This characters's attack rolls can't be rerolled. When this character is given an object action, it may use Gungnir as the held object. If you do, also modify attack +3, and the attack deals penetrating damage. (This is still an object attack)

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When this character uses it, once per turn, you may reroll the result.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: When this character hits an opposing character, after resolutions, if your attack roll was 10-12 you may give the hit character an action token.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: KNOCKBACK.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: This character's attack rolls of 11 that hit count as critical hits. If this character critically hits, after resolutions you may give the hit character an action token.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Support, and if the result of the roll to heal is 1, KO this object.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: This character's attack rolls of 10-11 that hit count as critical hits.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Giant Reach: 2.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Giant Reach: 2. When this character is given an object action, it may use Spear as the held object. (This is still an object attack.)

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Modify speed -3. When this character hits, after resolutions you may KO this Object. If you do, choose a hit character to modify speed -3 for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Energy Shield/Deflection.
